translation.en: But remember, thunderstorms down here in Florida are generally isolated,
translation.zh:
‎但记住 佛罗里达州的雷暴
‎通常是单独的

translation.en: and so just because there's thunderstorms on the horizon
translation.zh: ‎所以就因为地平线上有雷暴

translation.en: doesn't mean we can't launch.
translation.zh: ‎不代表我们不能发射

translation.en: I'm more optimistic than pessimistic,
translation.zh: ‎我的乐观多于悲观

translation.en: but we're gonna get one last look at the top of the hour.
translation.zh: ‎但我们要最后看一遍最精彩的时刻

translation.en: [cameraman] Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 先生

translation.en: -Have a great launch. -[Jim] My pleasure. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-祝你今晚愉快
‎-我的荣幸 谢谢

translation.en: -Hey, this is huge. -[cameraman] We got more down there.
translation.zh:
‎-喂 这可是大事
‎-我们下面还有更多的事

translation.en: Gets me through the day. -[cameraman laughs] -I'm very grateful.
translation.zh: ‎陪我度过这一天 我非常感激

translation.en: [Hans] It's not too bad.
translation.zh: ‎并没有那么糟

translation.en: I mean…
translation.zh: ‎我是说…

translation.en: …it's a mess, but at least it's… It has a chance to clear up.
translation.zh:
‎现在是一团糟 但至少…
‎还有放晴的机会

translation.en: [Jim] The big thing right now is isolated thunderstorms.
translation.zh: ‎现在最重要的是单独的雷暴

translation.en: The question is, is it gonna be sufficiently problematic
translation.zh: ‎问题是 在我们无法发射的地方

translation.en: to where we… we can't launch?
translation.zh: ‎是否会有足够的问题

translation.en: Um, right now, I'm being told fifty-fifty.
translation.zh: ‎现在 我被告知情况是对半分的

translation.en: Hi, it's me, Tim Dodd, the Everyday Astronaut.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 是我 蒂姆·多德 每日宇航员

translation.en: I'm three miles away, looking at the rocket right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在在1.86千米外 看着火箭

translation.en: The weather is starting to clear up here a little bit,
translation.zh: ‎这里的天气开始有点放晴了

translation.en: but I can tell you, based on the amount of people,
translation.zh: ‎但我可以告诉你 根据人数来看

translation.en: this is definitely the launch to watch for the year, guys.
translation.zh: ‎这绝对是今年值得关注的发射 各位

translation.en: Now, just waiting to hear what's gonna happen.
translation.zh: ‎现在就等着听接下来会发生什么吧

translation.en: My name is Jessie Anderson.
translation.zh: ‎我叫杰西·安德森

translation.en: I'm a lead manufacturing engineer here at SpaceX,
translation.zh:
‎我是太空探索技术公司的
‎首席制造工程师

translation.en: and I speak for all of us when I say we could not be more excited
translation.zh:
‎我代表我们所有人说
‎我们对终于能把人类

translation.en: to finally be sending humans to the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎送上国际空间站感到无比兴奋

translation.en: It's a great day.
translation.zh: ‎今天真是美好的一天

translation.en: Today's mission is known as Demonstration Mission-2.
translation.zh: ‎今天的任务被称为演示任务二号

translation.en: It's gonna be the first time a commercially built spacecraft
translation.zh: ‎这将是商业建造的航天器

translation.en: will launch people to the space station.
translation.zh: ‎首次将人送往空间站

translation.en: Demo-2 is an end-to-end flight test,
translation.zh: ‎示范二号是端到端的飞行测试

translation.en: from launch all the way to docking,
translation.zh: ‎从发射到对接

translation.en: and ending with splashdown.
translation.zh: ‎最后以在海中降落告终

translation.en: And it's the final test for NASA to certify SpaceX
translation.zh:
‎这是美国宇航局
‎认证太空探索技术公司

translation.en: for regular crew flights to the space station.
translation.zh:
‎定期向空间站进行
‎载人飞行的最后一次测试

translation.en: [Gwynne] I don't get nervous for launches.
translation.zh: ‎我不会因为发射而紧张

translation.en: I don't get nervous for doing speaking gigs.
translation.zh: ‎我不会因为演讲而紧张

translation.en: Starting a month ago or so, I started getting nervous for this launch.
translation.zh:
‎大约一个月前开始
‎我开始为这次发射感到紧张

translation.en: I shouldn't have eaten breakfast.
translation.zh: ‎我不应该吃早餐的

translation.en: [man] It's a stress-eating kind of day.
translation.zh: ‎今天是压力超大的一天

translation.en: And then yesterday was tough, and today, just forget it.
translation.zh: ‎昨天很难熬 今天就忘掉吧

translation.en: Hard to get any work done at all today.
translation.zh: ‎今天很难完成任何工作

translation.en: I always worry about the things that we don't know about.
translation.zh: ‎我总是担心我们不知道的事情

translation.en: Launch makes you superstitious.
translation.zh: ‎发射会让你迷信

translation.en: It's called launch juju. Um, I don't know where that term came from.
translation.zh:
‎这叫做发射符咒 我不知道这个词
‎是从哪儿来的

translation.en: I think it's an Air Force term actually, but people do very odd things.
translation.zh:
‎我想这是一个空军术语
‎但人们会做非常奇怪的事

translation.en: [man] So here's my Dragon socks.
translation.zh: ‎所以这是我的龙飞船袜子

translation.en: Cool launch-day socks is my ritual.
translation.zh: ‎发射日穿酷酷的袜子是我的惯有仪式

translation.en: [Hans] I don't look at the mission sticker.
translation.zh: ‎我不看任务标签

translation.en: I can't look at it before we fly.
translation.zh: ‎在我们飞之前我不能看它

translation.en: [woman] I will wear red sometimes when it's really important.
translation.zh: ‎我有时会在非常重要的时候穿红色

translation.en: Don't wear red on launch day.
translation.zh: ‎发射那天不要穿红色的

translation.en: -Really? -Red means "no go." Don't wear it.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-红色代表“无法发射” 别穿

translation.en: Wearing green would be extra good luck.
translation.zh: ‎穿绿色会带来好运

translation.en: Hans has got it figured out.
translation.zh: ‎汉斯已经搞清楚了

translation.en: I call it the launch beard. Like, you know, it grows out.
translation.zh: ‎我称之为“发射胡子” 就是会长出来

translation.en: And then day of the launch, it cleans up.
translation.zh: ‎然后在发射的那天会被清理掉

translation.en: I usually have a beard,
translation.zh: ‎我通常都是留胡子的

translation.en: but if we don't launch more than two days in a row, I shave the beard.
translation.zh:
‎但如果我们连续两天不能发射
‎我就剃了胡子

translation.en: [Bala] Why is that?
translation.zh: ‎那是为什么？

translation.en: Just so that we can launch on the third day.
translation.zh: ‎这样我们就可以在第三天发射了

translation.en: [Gwynne] I was in Scotland for the first time we got to orbit,
translation.zh: ‎我们第一次进入轨道时 我在苏格兰

translation.en: so for every launch,
translation.zh: ‎所以每次发射

translation.en: I put stickies in my shoe that say "Scotland" on it.
translation.zh:
‎我都会在鞋里放了几张
‎写着"苏格兰"的纸条

translation.en: So I am always in Scotland when we launch.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们发射的时候
‎我总是在苏格兰

translation.en: [man] Are you a very superstitious person?
translation.zh: ‎你是一个非常迷信的人吗？

translation.en: I'm not at all, uh, except for this.
translation.zh: ‎除了这件事 我完全不迷信

translation.en: I think we've pounded flat the risks that we understand
translation.zh:
‎我认为我们已经
‎完全忽视了我们所理解的风险

translation.en: and the risks we know about,
translation.zh: ‎以及我们所知道的风险

translation.en: and I really hope we do the right thing by Doug and Bob
translation.zh: ‎我真的希望道格和鲍勃做正确的事

translation.en: and get them to the space station safely
translation.zh: ‎让他们安全送达空间站

translation.en: and inspire generations to come.
translation.zh: ‎并激励未来的几代人

translation.en: Really, we just can't fuck it up. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎真的 我们不能搞砸了

translation.en: That's the most important thing about today.
translation.zh: ‎这是今天最重要的事情

translation.en: No fucking it up.
translation.zh: ‎不能搞砸了

translation.en: [Jim] This is my second one.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的第二瓶

translation.en: That was my first. So I don't know, is that like three? I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎那是我的第一瓶 我不知道
‎那像是第三瓶吗？我不知道

translation.en: [man 1] Okay, Jim, we have the, uh, official weather update.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 吉姆 我们有了官方的天气更新

translation.en: The cell that they're worried about has moved to the north.
translation.zh:
‎他们担心的那个风暴
‎已经挪到北方去了

translation.en: -So we're go for launch. -[Jim] Fantastic.
translation.zh:
‎-所以我们要去发射了
‎-太棒了

translation.en: -So we're gonna head over. -[man 2] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-所以我们要去那里了
‎-是的

translation.en: Big day, sir.
translation.zh: ‎是个大日子 先生

translation.en: -[Jim] It is. -[man 1] Yeah, it is.
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-对 是个大日子

translation.en: [Jim] I think anybody who's been involved in this for the last decade
translation.zh:
‎我认为任何
‎在过去十年中参与其中的人

translation.en: has got to be on the edge of their seat right now.
translation.zh: ‎现在都已经处于紧张状态了

translation.en: This agency has had many, many tough times in the past…
translation.zh:
‎这个机构在过去
‎经历了很多很多艰难的时期…

translation.en: but for Bob and Doug's launch today,
translation.zh: ‎但对于今天鲍勃和道格的发射

translation.en: we've done everything we can.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经尽力了

translation.en: There comes that moment when you say, "Okay, now is the time."
translation.zh:
‎现在到了当你说：“好吧
‎现在是时候了”

translation.en: [Jessie] Here they come, NASA astronauts Bob Behnken and Doug Hurley.
translation.zh:
‎他们来了 ‎美国宇航局宇航员鲍勃·班肯
‎和道格·赫尔利

translation.en: They've each made this journey twice before.
translation.zh:
‎他们之前每个人
‎都经历过两次这场旅程

translation.en: [male host] There's Megan and Karen and their sons.
translation.zh: ‎那是梅根和凯伦 还有他们的儿子们

translation.en: -I love you. -[boy] I love you, Dad.
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你
‎-我爱你 爸爸

translation.en: Here's my big hug. Here comes the big hug.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的拥抱 来个大大的拥抱吧

translation.en: Oh, squeeze.
translation.zh: ‎抱抱

translation.en: [Doug] When you're saying goodbye to your family, you really realize
translation.zh:
‎当你和家人说再见的时候
‎你会真的意识到

translation.en: that there's more to it than just a rocket going up.
translation.zh: ‎这不仅仅是火箭升空那么简单

translation.en: That there's… There can be consequences.
translation.zh: ‎这可能…可能会有后果的

translation.en: [Bob] To see your parent launch on the rocket,
translation.zh: ‎看你的父母乘坐火箭升空…

translation.en: it's scary for a small kid.
translation.zh: ‎这对小孩子来说太可怕了

translation.en: The first time we shared it with him,
translation.zh: ‎我们第一次告诉他时

translation.en: his opinion was, you know, "Daddy can't go to space."
translation.zh: ‎他的看法是“爸爸可不能去太空”

translation.en: That's something I wasn't quite, uh, prepared for.
translation.zh: ‎这是让我措手不及的事情

translation.en: I didn't expect to… to have that hit me as much as it did.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到它会给我这么大的冲击

translation.en: [woman] And we are following the convoy
translation.zh: ‎我们正在跟着护送队

translation.en: as they continue to make their way to the pad.
translation.zh: ‎他们继续带路前往发射台

translation.en: These people have been working long hours.
translation.zh: ‎这些人工作了很长时间

translation.en: Coronavirus happened, and we made it.
translation.zh: ‎发生了新冠疫情 我们挺过来了

translation.en: And here they come.
translation.zh: ‎他们来了

translation.en: Just minutes from now, the astronauts will climb into Dragon.
translation.zh: ‎几分钟后 宇航员将登上龙飞船

translation.en: [man] It's a beautiful view up there, too,
translation.zh: ‎上面的景致也很好

translation.en: of getting ready for the business at hand of heading to the cosmos.
translation.zh: ‎要先完成手头的事情 准备前往宇宙

translation.en: [technician] We're gonna make sure all your zippers are closed,
translation.zh: ‎我们要确保你所有的拉链都拉好

translation.en: minus your gloves.
translation.zh: ‎摘掉你的手套

translation.en: Good?
translation.zh: ‎好吗？

translation.en: [man 1] Does it feel like this line is gonna move?
translation.zh: ‎感觉这条线会动吗？

translation.en: And then this will kind of move off. [man 2] This should subside anything behind it.
translation.zh:
‎-然后这个就移开了
‎-这应该能掩盖它后面的一切

translation.en: -Okay. -[man 2] Probably a couple hours.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-大概要几个小时

translation.en: I think if we can get Elon here. I just wanna make sure he's in the loop.
translation.zh:
‎我想知道我们能否联系到埃隆
‎我只是想确保他知情

translation.en: [Elon] I just wanna double-check. Who's doing the measurement?
translation.zh: ‎我只想再确认一次 谁在测量？

translation.en: [Kiko] The Range.
translation.zh: ‎应急组

translation.en: Yeah, great, but who at the Range?
translation.zh: ‎是啊 很好 但应急组是谁？

translation.en: Uh, the Launch Weather Officer.
translation.zh: ‎发射气象员

translation.en: Basically, the whole weather office.
translation.zh: ‎基本上 就是整个气象局

translation.en: They're the ones that basically make the call on the Range weather.
translation.zh:
‎他们基本上在应急天气变化的时候
‎会发出警告

translation.en: Mike's gonna call it right now.
translation.zh: ‎迈克现在就要呼叫

translation.en: [Mike] Dragon, SpaceX. Weather is go at this time.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎天气条件理想

translation.en: Dragon copy. Go weather.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船收到 天气可以发射

translation.en: [Mike] Dragon, SpaceX. You are go for section seven.
translation.zh: ‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: Close visors and arm launch escape system.
translation.zh: ‎关闭面罩并激活发射逃生系统

translation.en: Visors coming closed.
translation.zh: ‎面罩即将关闭

translation.en: 7.2, our visors are closed, and we're arming the launch escape system.
translation.zh:
‎7.2 我们的面罩已关闭
‎我们正在激活发射逃生系统

translation.en: [officer 1] Launch escape system is verified armed.
translation.zh: ‎发射逃生系统已确认激活

translation.en: [launch director] Launch director to countdown net, poll is complete,
translation.zh:
‎发射总指挥移交至倒计时网
‎全体通过

translation.en: and we have a go to proceed with propellant load.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以继续进行推进燃料装填

translation.en: [officer 2] Propellant load has started.
translation.zh: ‎推进燃料装填开始

translation.en: [launch director] Dragon, SpaceX launch director.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司发射总指挥
‎呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: 2D to violate a couple of weather rules
translation.zh: ‎2D检测到几条天气规则被违反

translation.en: that now do not expect to clear in time for launch.
translation.zh: ‎目前预计不能正常进行发射

translation.en: Proceed to 2D launch abort sequence, please.
translation.zh: ‎请继续进行2D发射中止程序

translation.en: [Bob] We copy. We can see some raindrops on the windows,
translation.zh: ‎我们收到 可以看到窗户上有雨滴

translation.en: and it's just part of the deal.
translation.zh: ‎意外因素也是航天发射的一部分

translation.en: [Mike] Copy all.
translation.zh: ‎全部收到

translation.en: [Kiko] That's it.
translation.zh: ‎就这样了

translation.en: -It's aborted? -[Kiko] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-中止了？
‎-对

translation.en: It's not our day.
translation.zh: ‎今天运气不好

translation.en: Basically, we've got ten major weather rules,
translation.zh: ‎基本上 我们有十大天气规则

translation.en: and three of them are in violation right now.
translation.zh: ‎现在有三条都不符合

translation.en: -Three? -Yeah.
At least eyeballing it, this does not look like we should be stopping launch.
translation.zh:
‎至少肉眼上看
‎看起来不应该停止发射

translation.en: We wanna make sure
translation.zh: ‎我们想确保

translation.en: we're not scrubbing based on half-hour-old weather.
translation.zh:
‎我们不是根据
‎半小时前的天气数据停飞

translation.en: [man] The measurement's real-time… it's real-time lightning.
translation.zh:
‎-测量是即时的
‎-它是基于实时闪电的

translation.en: -[Elon] Okay. -[man] Yeah.
We just wanna make sure it's real and we're not jumping at shadows.
translation.zh:
‎我们只想确保它是真实的
‎我们不会冒险

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Kiko] So next launch time is Saturday.
translation.zh: ‎所以下一个发射时间是周六

translation.en: [Elon] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Kiko] I… am bummed.
translation.zh: ‎我很懊恼

translation.en: -[chuckling] Yes, I am bummed too. -[Kiko laughing]
translation.zh: ‎是的 我也很懊恼

translation.en: I, too, am bummed. Yes.
translation.zh: ‎我也很懊恼 是的

translation.en: I am too.
translation.zh: ‎我也是

translation.en: [Mike] Dragon, SpaceX. Thanks for the valiant effort today.
translation.zh: ‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: Appreciate your resilience.
translation.zh: ‎感谢你们的适应力

translation.en: [Doug] Yeah, we appreciate those words.
translation.zh: ‎没错 谢谢夸奖

translation.en: Everybody did great today, and we'll do it again on Saturday.
translation.zh:
‎大家今天都很棒
‎我们周六会再来一次

translation.en: [woman] Today, we're giving it another shot.
translation.zh: ‎今天 我们再试一次

translation.en: Wednesday's first attempt was postponed due to that wild weather,
translation.zh:
‎周三的第一次尝试
‎因恶劣天气被推迟了

translation.en: but if all goes well today, we will mark a new first
translation.zh:
‎但是如果今天一切顺利
‎我们会创造新的第一次

translation.en: and usher in the commercial-crew era of American spaceflight.
translation.zh: ‎迎来美国太空飞行的商业船员时代

translation.en: [Doug] To get an actual scrub, it really was almost like a gift.
translation.zh: ‎这次停飞 就像是一份礼物

translation.en: It was just one last chance
translation.zh: ‎这是最后一次机会

translation.en: to go through and evaluate and make sure everything's ready to fly.
translation.zh:
‎去克服困难、进行评估
‎保证准备好起飞

translation.en: But from an emotional standpoint, it was extremely difficult.
translation.zh: ‎但从情感上来说 这是非常困难的

translation.en: My son, Jack, was really hit pretty hard when we scrubbed.
translation.zh:
‎我的儿子 杰克
‎我们停飞的时候 他真的很受打击

translation.en: Karen said he kind of went and sat in a chair
translation.zh: ‎凯伦说他去坐在一张椅子上

translation.en: and just wanted to be by himself.
translation.zh: ‎只想一个人待着

translation.en: He kind of gets that there's a lot that can go wrong.
translation.zh: ‎他大概明白有很多地方可能出错

translation.en: He had already said goodbye to me,
translation.zh: ‎他已经跟我说了再见

translation.en: and I… I think he probably didn't wanna have to go through that again.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他可能不想再经历一次

translation.en: Hey, buddy, I love you.
translation.zh: ‎喂 小伙子 我爱你

translation.en: You bet. This is gonna be cool.
translation.zh: ‎肯定 这会很酷的

translation.en: Be good for Mommy.
translation.zh: ‎对妈妈好一点

translation.en: See you, buddy.
translation.zh: ‎再见 小伙子

translation.en: [Bob] Hey, Theo, you be on good behavior, okay?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 西奥 你要听话 好吗？

translation.en: And enjoy today. Watch the rocket for me, okay?
translation.zh: ‎今天开心点 帮我看着火箭 好吗？

translation.en: I'll call you from the space station.
translation.zh: ‎我会从空间站给你打电话的

translation.en: Okay, you're welcome.
translation.zh: ‎好的 不客气

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你

translation.en: To see your parent launch on a rocket
translation.zh: ‎看着父母坐火箭升空

translation.en: is something that my son hasn't been exposed to.
translation.zh: ‎是我儿子从未接触过的东西

translation.en: I needed to figure out a way to prepare him for that.
translation.zh: ‎我需要想办法让他做好准备

translation.en: This is, uh, Tremor.
translation.zh: ‎这是震颤

translation.en: Tremor is, uh… was actually my son's dinosaur.
translation.zh: ‎震颤…其实是我儿子的恐龙

translation.en: I decided to bring Tremor and take him through the entire process,
translation.zh:
‎我决定带上震颤
‎然后带它经历整个过程

translation.en: you know, to make it feel a little bit more normal for my son.
translation.zh:
‎你知道 让这个过程
‎在我儿子眼中更正常一些

translation.en: [officer 1] Core and countdown one in T-minus 2 hours and 46 minutes.
translation.zh:
‎核心反应和最后倒计时
‎还有2小时46分钟

translation.en: The crew has arrived at the White Room. Its ingress is in progress on schedule.
translation.zh:
‎机组人员已经到达白屋
‎正在按计划进入

translation.en: [launch director] Launch Control, clear to retract the axis arm on time.
translation.zh: ‎发射控制系统 准时撤离轴臂

translation.en: Crew access arm retract has started.
translation.zh: ‎船员出入臂开始收回

translation.en: [launch director] Launch director to countdown net, poll is complete,
translation.zh:
‎发射总指挥移交至倒计时网
‎投票完成

translation.en: and we have a go to proceed with propellant load.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以继续进行推进燃料装填

translation.en: [officer 2] Copy.
translation.zh: ‎收到

translation.en: [Kiko] What's up, Elon?
translation.zh: ‎你好吗 埃隆？

translation.en: Looking a little nicer today.
translation.zh: ‎天气今天看起来好多了

translation.en: [Elon] It looks really nice.
translation.zh: ‎看起来很不错

translation.en: -Oh, palo santo. -[Elon] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-圣檀木
‎-对

translation.en: Like it. Anything you can do. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎很喜欢 你想做什么都可以

translation.en: It's for good luck.
translation.zh: ‎只是为了好运

translation.en: Situations like this, you can't have too much luck.
translation.zh: ‎这种情况下 你不能靠太多运气成分

translation.en: [man] You believe in luck?
translation.zh: ‎你相信运气吗？

translation.en: [Elon] I believe luck is the best superpower.
translation.zh: ‎我相信运气是最好的超能力

translation.en: If you can have any superpower, luck is the one you'd want.
translation.zh:
‎如果你能拥有超能力
‎你会想拥有好运气

translation.en: [officer 3] Propellant fills are complete.
translation.zh: ‎推进燃料装填完毕

translation.en: Falcon 9 is in startup. Dragon is in countdown.
translation.zh:
‎猎鹰9号正在启动
‎龙飞船发射进入倒计时

translation.en: FTS is armed for launch.
translation.zh: ‎飞行终止系统已激活

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: Holy shit, here we go.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 要开始了

translation.en: -Here we go. -[Elon sighs]
translation.zh: ‎来吧

translation.en: [launch director] Dragon, SpaceX. Go for launch.
translation.zh: ‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: SpaceX, Dragon. We're go for launch. Let's light this candle.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船呼叫太空探索技术公司

translation.en: [officer 4] Ten, nine, eight, seven, six,
translation.zh: ‎十、九、八、七、六

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one, zero.
translation.zh: ‎五、四、三、二、一、零

translation.en: -Ignition. Liftoff. -[rumbling]
translation.zh: ‎点火 发射

translation.en: -It's going. -Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎-开始了
‎-来了

translation.en: Stage one propulsion is nominal.
translation.zh: ‎一级推进正常

translation.en: Falcon power telemetry nominal.
translation.zh: ‎猎鹰火箭动力遥测正常

translation.en: We're monitoring.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在监控

translation.en: [officer] Vehicle is supersonic and passing through maximum dynamic pressure.
translation.zh: ‎载具超音速 正通过最大动压点

translation.en: [Bob] Copy one bravo.
translation.zh: ‎收到

translation.en: [launch director] And 1D throttle down.
translation.zh: ‎1D发动机关闭

translation.en: [Doug] Throttling down the Merlin engines.
translation.zh: ‎关闭梅林引擎

translation.en: [Kiko] Standing by for separation.
translation.zh: ‎准备分离

translation.en: Dragon copy.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船收到

translation.en: [officer] Stage separation confirmed.
translation.zh: ‎两级确定分离

translation.en: [Kiko] First stage has done its job.
translation.zh: ‎第一级完成了自己的工作

translation.en: Switch over to the second.
translation.zh: ‎转换到二级火箭

translation.en: Second stage ignited.
translation.zh: ‎第二级点火

translation.en: [Bob] SpaceX, Dragon. Thanks for the great ride to space.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船呼叫太空探索技术公司

translation.en: Congratulations. We just put… we just put astronauts in orbit.
translation.zh:
‎恭喜 我们刚刚…
‎我们成功把宇航员送入了预定轨道

translation.en: -Incredible. -Yeah!
translation.zh:
‎-难以置信
‎-耶！

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: Well-done, guys.
translation.zh: ‎做得好 各位

translation.en: -Good work. -[man] That's awesome.
translation.zh:
‎-干得好
‎-太棒了

translation.en: Congrats hug.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜的抱抱

translation.en: That's real, dude. That's space!
translation.zh: ‎那是真的 老兄 那是太空！

translation.en: [Elon] Wow. It only takes nine minutes to get to orbit.
translation.zh: ‎进入轨道只需要九分钟

translation.en: Nine minutes, and you're going 25 times the speed of sound.
translation.zh: ‎九分钟 你的速度是音速的25倍

translation.en: Bob and Doug--
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃和道格…

translation.en: [Elon] Bob and Doug are cool as cucumbers.
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃和道格稳如泰山

translation.en: [Kiko] Just hanging out. It looks too smooth.
translation.zh: ‎只是出去玩而已 ‎看起来太顺利了

translation.en: [Kiko] Two dads.
translation.zh: ‎两个爸爸

translation.en: Dads in space.
translation.zh: ‎在太空的爸爸

translation.en: [Doug] Well, everyone, kind of a tradition we've had with spacecraft,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 大家 这是我们的一个传统

translation.en: going way back to the Mercury era.
translation.zh: ‎从第一代“水星”飞船就开始了

translation.en: We're given the honor to name this capsule.
translation.zh: ‎我们有幸能命名这颗太空舱

translation.en: Without further ado,
translation.zh: ‎废话不多说

translation.en: we would like to, uh, welcome you aboard Capsule Endeavour.
translation.zh:
‎我们很乐意欢迎你们
‎登上奋进号太空舱

translation.en: [Bob] Uh, I'll tell you that for the ride uphill,
translation.zh: ‎我会告诉你们 在上升的时候

translation.en: while it was a… an exciting ride,
translation.zh: ‎这是一段令人兴奋的旅程

translation.en: I think we got a… a couple of surprises
translation.zh: ‎我想我们还是很惊喜

translation.en: just in terms of the way the vehicle is kind of moving
translation.zh: ‎因为载具有些轻微移动

translation.en: and… and shaking and taking you into orbit.
translation.zh: ‎摇晃着带你进入轨道

translation.en: You can tell that it's, uh…
translation.zh: ‎你可以看出…

translation.en: It's fighting against the Earth as it makes its way into space.
translation.zh: ‎它在与地心引力对抗着

translation.en: We did, it turns out, end up with one stowaway
translation.zh: ‎结果我们今天发射的时候发现

translation.en: on board our, uh, vehicle when we launched today.
translation.zh: ‎我们载具里有一位偷渡者

translation.en: I hope both of our sons were super excited to see, uh, their toy
translation.zh:
‎我希望我们两个的儿子
‎发现他们的玩具

translation.en: floating around with us on board.
translation.zh: ‎在跟我们漂浮时都能超级兴奋

translation.en: I'm sure they would rather be here, given the opportunity,
translation.zh:
‎我相信他们如果有机会
‎也会想来这里

translation.en: but hopefully, they're proud of this as well.
translation.zh: ‎但希望 他们也为此感到骄傲

translation.en: [Doug] So with that, I think it'll be good night from Capsule Endeavour.
translation.zh:
‎所以就这样 我想这就是
‎来自奋进号太空舱的晚安

translation.en: Good night, Megan and Theo.
translation.zh: ‎晚安 梅根和西奥

translation.en: And Karen and Jack.
translation.zh: ‎还有凯伦和杰克

translation.en: [Elon] Thank you. Congratulations.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 恭喜

translation.en: [Jim] We can breathe another sigh of relief. [Elon] Indeed.
translation.zh:
‎-我们可以再松一口气了
‎-的确

translation.en: [cameraman] You're good there?
translation.zh: ‎你在那里还好吗？

translation.en: -He's left of the pole? Yeah? -[man] I gotcha.
translation.zh:
‎-他在极点左边？是吧？
‎-我懂了

translation.en: [Jim] So far, everything has performed very, very well,
translation.zh: ‎目前 一切都进展得非常顺利

translation.en: and we are excited that Bob and Doug are safely in orbit
translation.zh:
‎我们很兴奋
‎能把鲍勃和道格安全地送入了轨道

translation.en: and on the way to the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎他们正在前往国际空间站的途中

translation.en: [reporter 1] Elon, what would you say to those who doubted SpaceX could do this?
translation.zh:
‎埃隆 你会对那些
‎质疑太空探索技术公司的人说什么？

translation.en: Do you have a message for them?
translation.zh: ‎你有话要告诉他们吗？

translation.en: Do I have a message for those who…
translation.zh: ‎我有没有话要对那些…

translation.en: -What? -[Jim] Who doubted you.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-质疑你的人

translation.en: Oh, doubted. Okay. I was like, "What did he--?" Okay. Um…
translation.zh:
‎质疑 好 我刚才说
‎“他说什么…？” 好

translation.en: Maybe I just blank out the word "doubt."
translation.zh: ‎也许我只是把“质疑”这个词删掉了

translation.en: No, I mean, I… To be totally frank, I doubted us too.
translation.zh: ‎不 坦白说 我…也怀疑过我们

translation.en: When starting SpaceX, I thought we maybe had a 10% chance of reaching orbit.
translation.zh:
‎初创太空探索技术公司的时候
‎我觉得我们有10%的机会进入轨道

translation.en: But fortunately, fate has smiled upon us and brought us to this day.
translation.zh:
‎但幸运的是 命运对我们微笑
‎让我们走到了今天

translation.en: [reporter 2] Elon, you said that you had told Bob and Doug's boys
translation.zh:
‎埃隆 你说你告诉了
‎鲍勃和道格他们俩的儿子

translation.en: that you'd do everything you can to bring them home safely.
translation.zh: ‎你会尽一切努力带他们安全回家

translation.en: Even with a safe launch out of the way, that must still weigh on you,
translation.zh:
‎就算这是一次安全发射
‎但这一定让你有负担

translation.en: and I wondered what it's like as a dad.
translation.zh: ‎我想知道你作为父亲是什么感受

translation.en: So, you know, uh, there's still…
translation.zh: ‎所以依然有…

translation.en: We still gotta dock with Space Station. We still gotta, uh… still gotta return.
translation.zh:
‎我们还要和空间站对接
‎我们还要…还要返回

translation.en: I think there's an argument that
translation.zh: ‎我想有一种观点认为

translation.en: the return is more… more dangerous in some ways than the ascent.
translation.zh: ‎在某些方面返回比升空更危险

translation.en: So we don't wanna declare victory yet.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们还不想宣布胜利

translation.en: Anyway… I'm getting choked up here, so…
translation.zh: ‎总之…我在这里都快哽咽了 所以…

translation.en: It… It's… Really, this…
translation.zh: ‎这…这…真的 这是…

translation.en: Yeah, I don't… I'm getting choked up. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎对 我不…我要哽咽了 抱歉

translation.en: I'm not sure I can answer the question any more than that except, um…
translation.zh: ‎我不确定我能回答这个问题 除了…

translation.en: Yeah, we're gonna do everything we can to make sure it gets home safely.
translation.zh:
‎对 我们会尽一切努力
‎确保火箭安全到家

translation.en: [Doug] Well, good morning, everyone, from, uh, Endeavour.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 各位 这是来自奋进号的消息

translation.en: We, uh, had a great night. Got to get a little sleep.
translation.zh:
‎我们度过了一个美好的夜晚
‎需要睡一会儿了

translation.en: And, uh, as you can see, a beautiful day pass right now.
translation.zh: ‎如你们所见 美好的一天已经过去了

translation.en: Getting pretty close to ISS,
translation.zh: ‎我们以每小时2.8万公里的速度

translation.en: uh, as we're flying at about 17,500 miles an hour
translation.zh: ‎环绕地球飞行 与国际空间站

translation.en: around the planet.
translation.zh: ‎非常接近

translation.en: [woman] Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check on big loop.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎对大回路系统进行通讯检查

translation.en: [Doug] SpaceX, Dragon. Loud and clear now on the big loop.
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船呼叫太空探索技术公司
‎大回路系统中清晰洪亮

translation.en: Good morning, Anna.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 安娜

translation.en: [Anna] Good morning. Great to hear your voice.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 很高兴听到你的声音

translation.en: [Doug] It's great to hear yours as well.
translation.zh: ‎能听到你的声音也很棒

translation.en: We're looking forward to rendezvousing with Space Station today.
translation.zh: ‎我们期待着今天与空间站的会合

translation.en: [Anna] I am responsible for being Bob and Doug's eyes and ears on the ground
translation.zh:
‎当鲍勃和道格接近
‎并与国际空间站对接时

translation.en: as they approach and then dock with the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎我负责充当他们在地面上的耳目

translation.en: My role is to help make sure that they are informed
translation.zh: ‎我的职责是帮助确保他们知道

translation.en: of anything that's going awry,
translation.zh: ‎任何出错的地方

translation.en: and I am forever grateful to be a part of this moment.
translation.zh: ‎我永远感激能成为这一刻的一部分

translation.en: One of my fourth-grade teachers was actually the daughter
translation.zh: ‎我四年级的一个老师实际上是

translation.en: of one of the astronauts on the Challenger.
translation.zh: ‎挑战者号宇航员的女儿

translation.en: She brought our class to NASA,
translation.zh: ‎她把我们班带去了美国宇航局

translation.en: and from that time on, I knew I wanted to be
translation.zh: ‎从那时起 我就知道我想成为

translation.en: a part of space operations.
translation.zh: ‎太空行动的一部分

translation.en: I still am amazed by how she… she ultimately changed my life,
translation.zh:
‎我仍然对她最终如何改变我的生活
‎感到惊讶

translation.en: and I imagine that she changed many other people's lives
translation.zh: ‎我想象她改变了许多人的生活

translation.en: as a result of something
translation.zh: ‎而这种结果

translation.en: that had to have been incredibly painful for her.
translation.zh: ‎对她来说是难以置信的痛苦

translation.en: Dragon, SpaceX.
translation.zh: ‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: Your rendezvous complete time is expected to be 1050 UTC.
translation.zh:
‎你的会合完成时间预计是
‎1050协调世界时

translation.en: [Bob] Copy.
translation.zh: ‎收到

translation.en: [Anna] As Dragon is approaching the space station,
translation.zh: ‎当龙飞船在靠近空间站时

translation.en: it's flying at incredible speeds.
translation.zh: ‎它以惊人的速度飞行

translation.en: It first does a series of burns
translation.zh: ‎首先它会进行一系列燃烧

translation.en: to get it in close proximity to the space station
translation.zh: ‎让其自身接近空间站

translation.en: until the point at which it is basically in a straight line
translation.zh: ‎直到它基本上与对接适配器

translation.en: towards the docking adapter.
translation.zh: ‎成一条直线

translation.en: The whole time, we are watching our telemetry
translation.zh:
‎整个过程中 我们都在观察
‎我们的遥测技术

translation.en: and making sure that when it gets to the docking adapter,
translation.zh: ‎确保当它到达对接适配器时

translation.en: it is precisely where it needs to be.
translation.zh: ‎精确地正处于它需要的位置

translation.en: One problem, and it's a collision.
translation.zh: ‎只要有一个问题 那就会导致碰撞

translation.en: We face that risk, and we deal with that
translation.zh:
‎我们面临着这种风险
‎为了应对这种风险

translation.en: by being extremely intentional in everything we do.
translation.zh: ‎我们在做任何事情时都需要非常注意

translation.en: [man] Space Station on the big loop.
translation.zh: ‎空间站在大回路系统上

translation.en: Dragon, tally ho. I know you guys probably see it on the video cameras,
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船发现目标
‎我知道你们可能在摄像机上看到了

translation.en: but with the naked eye, we can see it as well.
translation.zh: ‎但用肉眼 我们也能看到

translation.en: Looking like a nice, shiny new friend.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像个漂亮、闪亮的新朋友

translation.en: Dragon copies. We'll be there in a second.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船收到 我们马上就到

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX.
translation.zh: ‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船

translation.en: Ground is go for approach initiation.
translation.zh: ‎地面准备启动开始接近

translation.en: [Doug] Dragon on the big loop. We copy go.
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船在大回路系统上
‎我们收到并前往

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, just 400 meters directly below station,
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船 就在空间站正下方400米

translation.en: swinging itself up out in front to align itself with the docking adapter.
translation.zh: ‎把自己甩到前面 与对接适配器对齐

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX. Commanding hold.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎控制速度

translation.en: [Doug] Copy. We will command the hold.
translation.zh: ‎收到 我们将控制速度

translation.en: [officer] Dragon holding a little over 17,000 miles an hour,
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船以
‎超过每小时27358.8公里的速度

translation.en: directly out in front of the space station.
translation.zh: ‎正对着空间站

translation.en: [man] Space Station on the big loop.
translation.zh: ‎空间站在大回路系统上

translation.en: Crew on the International Space Station is ready for docking.
translation.zh:
‎国际空间站的工作人员
‎已经准备好进行对接

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX. You are go to execute final approach.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎你们开始执行最后的对接

translation.en: [Doug] Copy. Go for docking.
translation.zh: ‎收到 开始对接

translation.en: [Anna] We are following along with you.
translation.zh: ‎我们时刻关注着你们

translation.en: [Doug] One hundred meters away from the space station.
translation.zh: ‎离空间站100米远

translation.en: [Anna] You know, as we were approaching the space station,
translation.zh: ‎当我们接近空间站时

translation.en: I remember being extremely focused.
translation.zh: ‎我记得当时我极其专注

translation.en: I had a checklist in my mind.
translation.zh: ‎我脑子里有一张清单

translation.en: [Bob] We're inside 20 meters.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经在20米内

translation.en: [Anna] And I remember at one point, we were close to docking,
translation.zh: ‎我记得某个时刻 我们就快对接了

translation.en: and I looked up, and I saw Dragon.
translation.zh: ‎我向上看去 看到了龙飞船

translation.en: I just had this moment of almost pinching myself
translation.zh: ‎那一刻我几乎掐着自己

translation.en: that… that I couldn't believe this was happening.
translation.zh: ‎我不敢相信会发生这样的事

translation.en: I told myself this is… this is an incredibly special moment.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉自己这是一个非常特别的时刻

translation.en: [Bob] Three meters to go.
translation.zh: ‎还有三米远

translation.en: Two meters.
translation.zh: ‎两米

translation.en: We are inside the hands-off point. One meter to go.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经进入对接点 还有一米远

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX. Docking sequence is complete.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎对接程序已完成

translation.en: Welcome to the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到国际空间站

translation.en: [man] Dragon arriving.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船已到达

translation.en: The crew of Expedition 63 is honored to welcome
translation.zh: ‎远征63号的机组人员很荣幸地欢迎

translation.en: Dragon and the commercial crew program aboard the International Space Station.
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船和商业机组人员计划
‎登陆国际空间站

translation.en: Bob and Doug, glad to have you as part of the crew.
translation.zh:
‎鲍勃还有道格
‎很高兴你们成为我们的一员

translation.en: [officer] Aboard the International Space Station,
translation.zh: ‎在国际空间站上

translation.en: Commander Chris Cassidy standing by in node two.
translation.zh:
‎指挥官克里斯·卡西迪
‎正在二号节点待命

translation.en: He does have two crew members on board,
translation.zh: ‎他已经有两名机组人员在空间站中

translation.en: both Russian cosmonauts.
translation.zh: ‎都是俄罗斯宇航员

translation.en: He, uh, recently launched on the same Russian Soyuz spacecraft
translation.zh: ‎他最近 就在一个多月前由

translation.en: just a little more than a month ago.
translation.zh: ‎俄罗斯联盟号载人飞船发射

translation.en: [Chris] And with that, Endeavour, welcome to the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎奋进号 欢迎来到国际空间站

translation.en: Please come aboard.
translation.zh: ‎请登上空间站

translation.en: [Jim] Station, this is the NASA Administrator. Can you hear me?
translation.zh:
‎空间站 这里是美国宇航局局长
‎能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: We hear you loud and clear, sir.
translation.zh: ‎我们听得很清楚 先生

translation.en: Welcome to the space station.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到空间站

translation.en: [Jim] Thank you, Chris. It's good to see you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 克里斯 很高兴见到你

translation.en: And welcome to Bob and Doug.
translation.zh: ‎也欢迎鲍勃和道格

translation.en: I will tell you, the whole world saw this mission,
translation.zh:
‎我要告诉你们
‎全世界都看到了这次任务

translation.en: and we are so, so proud.
translation.zh: ‎我们非常非常骄傲

translation.en: I have a… a question for Chris.
translation.zh: ‎我有个问题要问克里斯

translation.en: Our crew here decided to be about three days late.
translation.zh: ‎我们的机组人员决定了晚到三天

translation.en: You gotta work them overtime, I presume now,
translation.zh: ‎我想现在你要让他们加加班

translation.en: to get them caught up on all the activities that they missed out on.
translation.zh: ‎让他们赶上错过的所有活动

translation.en: Well, the day they missed out on was a good one for them to skip.
translation.zh:
‎他们错过的那一天
‎对他们来说是个不错的选择

translation.en: It was Saturday housecleaning, and I…
translation.zh: ‎那天是周六大扫除 我…

translation.en: But I took care of it for 'em. We'll catch up next… next weekend.
translation.zh:
‎但我替他们处理好了
‎我们将在下周末再进行

translation.en: Uh, but in all seriousness,
translation.zh: ‎但说真的

translation.en: we're looking forward to some operational stuff later in the month.
translation.zh:
‎我们期待着
‎这个月晚些时候的一些操作

translation.en: Maybe we'll get outside and do some space walks.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们可以出去做一些太空漫步

translation.en: So we're… we're all super excited to have two more crewmates
translation.zh: ‎所以我们都非常兴奋能多两名队员

translation.en: to the Expedition 63 team.
translation.zh: ‎加入远征63队

translation.en: [man] Station, this is James Corden with the CBS Late Late Show.
translation.zh:
‎空间站 这里是詹姆斯·柯登
‎为你们带来的CBS深夜秀

translation.en: How are you, gentlemen? Can you hear me?
translation.zh:
‎你们好吗 先生们？
‎能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: James.
translation.zh: ‎詹姆斯

translation.en: Welcome aboard the International Space Station.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎登陆到国际空间站

translation.en: We heard you loud and clear.
translation.zh: ‎我们听得很清楚

translation.en: [James] How are you getting on up there? How are you doing? Are you okay?
translation.zh:
‎你们在上面过得怎么样？
‎状态好吗？你们没事吧？

translation.en: [Doug] We're doing pretty good.
translation.zh: ‎我们过得不错

translation.en: I think we're assimilating into the, uh, ISS life,
translation.zh: ‎我想我们正在融入国际空间站的生活

translation.en: trying to help Chris out as much as we can.
translation.zh: ‎尽我们所能帮助克里斯

translation.en: [James] That's great. I'm jealous of both of you right now
translation.zh: ‎那太好了 我现在很嫉妒你们俩

translation.en: because I've spent most of my life wanting to be weightless.
translation.zh:
‎因为我一生中大部分时间
‎都想试试失重

translation.en: Tell me, what's the best and worst thing
translation.zh: ‎跟我讲讲 每天在零重力环境中生活

translation.en: about living life in zero gravity every day?
translation.zh: ‎最好和最糟糕的事是什么？

translation.en: Oh, look at this.
translation.zh: ‎看看这个

translation.en: That's magnificent.
translation.zh: ‎简直太精彩了

translation.en: [Doug] You can imagine that there's a lot of places,
translation.zh: ‎你可以想象这里有很多地方

translation.en: like going to the restroom, for example,
translation.zh: ‎比如去洗手间

translation.en: where you like stuff to stay where you put it.
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢把东西放在你放的地方

translation.en: And so, uh, we definitely find that frustrating at times.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们有时确实会觉得很沮丧

translation.en: Time to go.
translation.zh: ‎该冲水了

translation.en: You take the valve, and, uh…
translation.zh: ‎你拿着真空管 然后…

translation.en: That's where your business goes.
translation.zh: ‎这就是你那些液体去的地方

translation.en: [Doug] They have six crew quarters on board the space station,
translation.zh: ‎他们在空间站上有六个乘员舱

translation.en: and those crew quarters are really, really nice.
translation.zh: ‎那些机组人员宿舍真的非常好

translation.en: You've got your laptop in there.
translation.zh: ‎在这里还有你自己的电脑

translation.en: You've got your sleeping bag attached to a wall.
translation.zh: ‎你还有绑在墙上的睡袋

translation.en: [interviewer] Can you reach down and touch your toes?
translation.zh: ‎你能伸手摸到你的脚趾吗？

translation.en: You probably would have to fold your computer up,
translation.zh: ‎你可能必须要把电脑折叠起来

translation.en: and then you might be able to kind of do a sit-up,
translation.zh: ‎然后你就可以做仰卧起坐了

translation.en: uh, and not hit both walls.
translation.zh: ‎而不触碰两面墙壁

translation.en: I mean, it's certainly not huge,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 显然这不算很大的

translation.en: but it's actually kind of…
translation.zh: ‎但确实是…

translation.en: kind of cozy, if… if I had to be honest.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 是挺舒服的

translation.en: [woman] What kind of liquids can you drink?
translation.zh: ‎你能喝什么样的液体？

translation.en: Is there a cocktail hour in space?
translation.zh: ‎太空里有鸡尾酒时间吗？

translation.en: Every hour is cocktail hour for, uh…
translation.zh: ‎对于宇航员来说 每个小时…

translation.en: for astronauts.
translation.zh: ‎都是鸡尾酒时间

translation.en: Because you can drink balls of fluid right out of the air like that.
translation.zh:
‎因为你可以像这样
‎直接从空气中喝液体球

translation.en: I don't know how many of these examples I wanna set for my son,
translation.zh:
‎我不知道我想给我的儿子
‎看多少这样的例子

translation.en: because he'll be playing with his food all day
translation.zh: ‎因为如果他有机会看到这样的东西

translation.en: if he gets the chance to see something like this.
translation.zh: ‎他会一整天都玩他的食物

translation.en: Chicken.
translation.zh: ‎鸡肉

translation.en: [Doug] We exercise for about two hours, uh, every day,
translation.zh: ‎我们每天锻炼大约两个小时

translation.en: with weight lifting and either running or cycling
translation.zh: ‎比如举重、跑步或骑自行车

translation.en: to maintain our health and our fitness for our return.
translation.zh: ‎为了我们的回程 保持我们的健康

translation.en: [Bob] Our heart,
translation.zh: ‎我们的心脏

translation.en: its most important job is to feed the brain oxygenated blood.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的工作是为大脑提供含氧血液

translation.en: And then when you take the gravity vector out of the picture,
translation.zh: ‎然后当你获取大量不相干的重力矢量

translation.en: the heart sends too much up to the brain, and your head gets all puffed up.
translation.zh:
‎心脏把太多的东西送到大脑
‎你的脑袋就会膨胀起来

translation.en: [Karen] The way your body adapts to weightlessness,
translation.zh: ‎你的身体适应失重的方式

translation.en: I distinctly remember when I first got to space,
translation.zh: ‎我清楚地记得我第一次进入太空时

translation.en: every time I would flip upside down, I felt like I was upside down.
translation.zh:
‎每次我翻过来
‎我都感觉自己被颠倒了

translation.en: And there was a moment
translation.zh: ‎有那么一瞬间

translation.en: where I was trying to hang my sleeping bag on the mid-deck wall,
translation.zh: ‎我想把睡袋挂在舱面中间的墙上

translation.en: and, just like this, my mind completely changed.
translation.zh: ‎就这样 我的想法完全改变了

translation.en: And from that point on, I could be in any orientation,
translation.zh: ‎从那时起 我可以在任何方向行动

translation.en: and I never felt like I was upside down.
translation.zh: ‎我从未觉得自己是颠倒的

translation.en: It was so neat to me,
translation.zh: ‎这对我来说太棒了

translation.en: the way your body and mind just switch like that.
translation.zh: ‎你的身体和思想就像那样转换

translation.en: [Bob] You feel congested
translation.zh: ‎你会觉得拥挤

translation.en: because you still have all this extra volume in your head.
translation.zh: ‎因为你的脑子里还有这些多余的容量

translation.en: So your sense of smell and your sense of taste are dull.
translation.zh: ‎所以你的嗅觉和味觉都很迟钝

translation.en: We have every hot sauce known to humankind.
translation.zh: ‎我们这里有人类已知的所有辣酱

translation.en: You pour that on absolutely everything.
translation.zh: ‎你会把辣酱倒在所有东西上

translation.en: [officer] I believe birthday wishes are in order, Bob. Is that true?
translation.zh: ‎我想应该到生日祝福了 鲍勃 对吧？

translation.en: [Bob] That's true. I got to join the 50-year-old club,
translation.zh: ‎没错 我加入了50岁的俱乐部

translation.en: just like these two other guys.
translation.zh: ‎就像其他两个人一样

translation.en: They've been teasing me all day about it.
translation.zh: ‎他们一整天都在取笑我

translation.en: [officer] Yeah, I know it's not safe to put 50 candles on a cake
translation.zh: ‎是的 我知道在高氧环境下

translation.en: in a high-oxygen environment,
translation.zh: ‎在蛋糕上放50根蜡烛不安全

translation.en: but at least make everybody sing to you.
translation.zh:
‎但至少让大家给你唱生日歌 ‎（“迷你”生日蛋糕
‎因为有人在某处爱着我）

translation.en: [Megan] Because I know so well what Bob is doing, I know he's working really hard.
translation.zh:
‎因为我很清楚鲍勃在做什么
‎我知道他工作很努力

translation.en: I've had those same experiences,
translation.zh: ‎我也有过同样的经历

translation.en: and I know it's hard to be away from your family.
translation.zh: ‎我知道离开家人很难

translation.en: It was important to us to do something special.
translation.zh: ‎做些特别的事对我们来说很重要

translation.en: That encouragement from home, I think, is really important,
translation.zh: ‎我认为来自家庭的鼓励非常重要

translation.en: that we're thinking of him, that we know what he's doing is hard.
translation.zh: ‎我们关心他 知道他所做的事情很难

translation.en: You know, the work requires, you know, a lot of dedication,
translation.zh: ‎这项工作需要大量的奉献

translation.en: a lot of focus, a lot of problem-solving, and always a lot of risk.
translation.zh:
‎大量的关注 解决大量的问题
‎并且总是伴随着大量的风险

translation.en: Can you guys hear me?
translation.zh: ‎你们听得到吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, loud and clear. -[Doug] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-能 听得很清晰
‎-好

translation.en: Check the PTT's off.
translation.zh: ‎检查按键通话是否关闭

translation.en: Houston air lock on one.
translation.zh: ‎（休斯顿空气 一号锁定）

translation.en: Uh, we're complete with the, uh, med-ox lab change-out procedure.
translation.zh:
‎我们已经完成了
‎医疗实验室的更换程序

translation.en: Going back to step 15 in 1.225.
[Anna] Thanks, Doug, for working the setup so well.
translation.zh: ‎多谢 道格 很好地完成了设置

translation.en: Got us right on timeline. We appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎正好赶上时间线 非常感谢

translation.en: Chris and Bob, good morning.
translation.zh: ‎克里斯和鲍勃 早上好

translation.en: -[Bob] Good morning. -[Chris] Good morning.
translation.zh:
‎-早上好
‎-早上好

translation.en: [Anna] Okay, with that, we'll step into the post depress.
translation.zh:
‎好了 这样之后
‎现在我们进入后降低状态

translation.en: -[Chris] EV1 copies. -[Bob] EV2 copies.
translation.zh:
‎-EV1 收到
‎-EV2 收到

translation.en: [Doug] To keep Space Station flying over the Earth,
translation.zh: ‎为了保持空间站在地球上空飞行

translation.en: it's a constant maintenance program.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个持续的维护项目

translation.en: We do all these space walks
translation.zh: ‎我们做这些太空行走

translation.en: to either add modules to the space station when we were building it.
translation.zh:
‎也是在建造空间站的时候
‎给它增加舱体

translation.en: And now it's to replace pieces of equipment
translation.zh: ‎现在要做的是更换一些设备

translation.en: that either are getting old or that fail.
translation.zh: ‎要么是旧的 要么是有故障的

translation.en: Our mission is essentially to upgrade the batteries.
translation.zh: ‎我们的任务主要是升级电池

translation.en: You know, the power of the space station is maintained by the battery system.
translation.zh: ‎空间站的能量是由电池系统维持的

translation.en: Through the solar arrays, the batteries are recharged.
translation.zh: ‎通过太阳能电池板 电池可以充电

translation.en: And so just like a rechargeable battery at home,
translation.zh: ‎就像家里的充电电池一样

translation.en: after many years of these cycles,
translation.zh: ‎经过多年的循环使用

translation.en: and then of course the hot and cold
translation.zh: ‎当然还有在太空中

translation.en: of being in space between daylight and darkness,
translation.zh: ‎昼夜交替的冷热交替

translation.en: those batteries wear out.
translation.zh: ‎这些电池就会耗尽

translation.en: It's a big job, because these batteries are like 400 pounds apiece.
translation.zh:
‎这是一项艰巨的工作
‎因为这些电池每节重363.16斤

translation.en: Fortunately, we got both Bob and Chris,
translation.zh:
‎幸运的是
‎我们这里来了鲍勃和克里斯

translation.en: two of our best spacewalkers.
translation.zh: ‎我们最好的两个太空漫步者

translation.en: -Doing good? -[Bob] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-一切都好吗？
‎-都好

translation.en: During my first two missions, I did six space walks
translation.zh: ‎在我的前两个任务中 我做了六次

translation.en: associated with the construction of the space station.
translation.zh: ‎与空间站建设有关的太空行走

translation.en: But even though I've done it a couple of times,
translation.zh: ‎但即使我做过几次

translation.en: it doesn't get easy for me.
translation.zh: ‎这对我来说也并不容易

translation.en: You know, there's a lot of pressure in a situation like that,
translation.zh: ‎在这种情况下压力是很大的

translation.en: that, uh, if you don't do your job, uh, successfully,
translation.zh: ‎如果你没有做好你的工作

translation.en: I could float off into space.
translation.zh: ‎我可能会飘到太空去

translation.en: You have to compartmentalize and take deep breaths
translation.zh: ‎你必须划分范围 并深呼吸

translation.en: so that you can pace yourself and stay focused
translation.zh: ‎这样你就可以调整自己的节奏

translation.en: in the face of this daunting task.
translation.zh: ‎在面对这个艰巨的任务时保持专注

translation.en: [Doug] Hey, Bob, we're ready with the crew lock depress.
translation.zh:
‎喂 鲍勃 我们准备好进行
‎机组人员制动按压了

translation.en: We're gonna take the, uh, depress pump power switch to "on."
translation.zh:
‎我们要把降压泵的电源开关
‎扳至“打开”

translation.en: [Bob] Okay. Depress pump power coming on.
translation.zh: ‎好 压泵电源开启

translation.en: [Doug] Good luck, guys.
translation.zh: ‎各位 祝你们好运

translation.en: [Anna] Okay, guys, great job. We're gonna pick up slowly.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 干得好 ‎我们将慢慢开始了

translation.en: [Bob] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Anna] Bob, for you, as you get outboard, you're looking for handrail 2075
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃 你在舱外 找2075号扶手

translation.en: for your green hook.
translation.zh: ‎来装你的绿钩

translation.en: [Bob] Copy. 2075.
-It's kind of dark out here, Chris. -[Chris] Yeah, it's kind of dark.
translation.zh:
‎-外面有点儿黑 克里斯
‎-是的 确实有点儿黑

translation.en: [Bob] How much longer till daylight has me?
translation.zh: ‎还有多久我才能看到黎明？

translation.en: [Anna] Approximately three and a half minutes till daylight.
translation.zh: ‎离天亮大约还有三分半钟

translation.en: -[Bob] Sun. -[Chris] Here comes the sun again.
translation.zh:
‎-太阳
‎-太阳又出来了

translation.en: [Anna] You should be coming up on the coast of California soon.
translation.zh: ‎你应该很快就会来到加利福尼亚海岸

translation.en: If you look south, you might see Hawthorne.
translation.zh: ‎如果你往南看 你可能会看到霍桑市

translation.en: And, Bob, did you wanna go to battery one first?
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃 你想先去一号电池那里吗？

translation.en: [Bob] Let's go to battery three first.
translation.zh: ‎我们先去三号电池那里吧

translation.en: [Anna] You'll be going to H1. Confirm socket tape line flush.
translation.zh: ‎你要去H1那里 确认插座胶带线齐平

translation.en: Looking for eight turns to release the battery.
translation.zh: ‎转八圈来卸下电池

translation.en: [Bob] I have control of the batteries?
translation.zh: ‎我能控制电池吗？

translation.en: [Chris] You have control.
translation.zh: ‎你可以控制

translation.en: [Doug] Okay, copy that.
translation.zh: ‎好 收到

translation.en: Looks good, guys.
translation.zh: ‎看起来不错 各位

translation.en: [Anna] And we're about to enter a night pass.
translation.zh: ‎我们马上就要进入黑夜了

translation.en: Bob, I have several cautions and warnings for you when you're ready.
translation.zh:
‎鲍勃 等你准备好了
‎我有几个注意事项和警告要告诉你

translation.en: [Bob] I'm ready.
translation.zh: ‎我准备好了

translation.en: [Anna] Okay, no sudden movements.
translation.zh: ‎好 不要突然移动

translation.en: The Bravo 7 torque setting may cause bolt failure.
translation.zh:
‎布拉沃七号扭矩设置
‎可能导致螺栓失效

translation.en: This could result in a non-captive sharp edge and broken shank.
translation.zh:
‎这可能导致一些不受控制的锋利边缘
‎剌伤小腿

translation.en: How copy?
translation.zh: ‎收到了吗？

translation.en: [Bob] Copy all.
translation.zh: ‎全部收到

translation.en: Is there any good news about this?
translation.zh: ‎目前有什么好消息吗？

translation.en: [Chris] Sounds scary, Bob. You sure you wanna do that?
translation.zh:
‎听起来很吓人 鲍勃
‎你确定你想这样操作吗？

translation.en: -[Bob] Obviously. -[Chris] Obviously.
translation.zh:
‎-当然
‎-当然

translation.en: [Bob] It looks equal to me on both sides.
translation.zh: ‎在我看来两边是相等的

translation.en: [Chris] I agree.
translation.zh: ‎我同意

translation.en: In the indicator, those locked.
translation.zh: ‎在指示器中 那些被锁定了

translation.en: [Anna] Copy, such a good install.
translation.zh: ‎收到 安装得很好

translation.en: Just a heads-up, you're going into a day pass in about a minute.
translation.zh: ‎提醒你一下 再过一分钟 就要天亮了

translation.en: [Bob] How about a picture?
translation.zh: ‎拍张照片怎么样？

translation.en: It's a good location, good time.
translation.zh: ‎这个时间地点都不错

translation.en: [Chris] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: [Bob] I don't know if we're gonna make it through another day-night cycle.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道我们还能不能
‎度过另一个昼夜循环

translation.en: [Chris] Yeah, that's good.
translation.zh: ‎对 这样很好

translation.en: [Bob] To see the wondrous events that are happening
translation.zh: ‎当你在太空行走的时候

translation.en: as you go through a space walk, there's sunrises and sunsets,
translation.zh:
‎你会看到奇妙的事情发生
‎会有日出日落

translation.en: you realize, you know, our world is precious,
translation.zh: ‎你会意识到 我们的世界是珍贵的

translation.en: and you start having appreciation for how little you actually are.
translation.zh:
‎你会开始感激
‎因为你其实是那么的渺小

translation.en: And I think every astronaut kind of feels the same way.
translation.zh: ‎我想每个宇航员都有同样的感受

translation.en: [Megan] As you go around the Earth, you don't see the lines and the borders
translation.zh:
‎当你绕着地球转的时候
‎你看不到地图上

translation.en: that are drawn on maps.
translation.zh: ‎所画的线和边界

translation.en: You see the Earth as this one entity,
translation.zh: ‎你把地球看作一个整体

translation.en: and it's our home.
translation.zh: ‎看作我们的家

translation.en: You sense its fragility
translation.zh: ‎你能感觉到它的脆弱

translation.en: in this sort of vast blackness of space and this very thin atmosphere
translation.zh:
‎在这浩瀚黑暗的太空中
‎在这稀薄的大气层中

translation.en: that's what's keeping us all safe.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们所有人的安全保障

translation.en: You feel very protective, I think,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得自己被很好地保护着

translation.en: and you feel a very strong connection.
translation.zh: ‎你会感觉到一种强烈的联系

translation.en: [Doug] Even the most hardened, cynical astronauts, you know,
translation.zh: ‎即使是最冷酷无情的宇航员

translation.en: once they've gone to space, it's changed them and for the better.
translation.zh:
‎一旦他们进入太空
‎他们就会被改变 会变得更好

translation.en: You know, you look down, and you go, "We're all on this little ball."
translation.zh:
‎你往下看 然后说
‎“我们都在这个小球体上”

translation.en: And then you look back into space
translation.zh: ‎然后你回头看看太空

translation.en: and get this overwhelming sense
translation.zh: ‎会对我们接下来要做的事

translation.en: of, you know, the things we're gonna do next.
translation.zh: ‎有一种强烈的感觉

translation.en: [officer] Okay, Neil, we can see you coming down the ladder now.
translation.zh:
‎好了 尼尔
‎我们现在看到你从梯子上下来了

translation.en: [Neil] That's one small step for man,
translation.zh: ‎这是个人的一小步

translation.en: one giant leap for mankind.
translation.zh: ‎却是人类的一大步

translation.en: [astronaut 1] Oh gee, that's great.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 简直太棒了

translation.en: [astronaut 2] Yes, indeed. They've got the flag up now, and you can see the stars and stripes.
translation.zh:
‎没错 他们现在升起了国旗
‎你可以看到那星条旗

translation.en: [astronaut 1] Beautiful, just beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎太美了 真的太美了

translation.en: [Neil] Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon.
translation.zh: ‎这是地球人第一次踏上月球

translation.en: July 1969 AD.
translation.zh: ‎公元1969年7月

translation.en: They came in peace for all mankind.
translation.zh: ‎他们为全人类的和平而来

translation.en: [officer] And welcome home.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎回家

translation.en: [Hans] Landing on the Moon
translation.zh: ‎登陆月球

translation.en: is singularly the most dramatic event in the history of humanity.
translation.zh: ‎是人类历史上最具戏剧性的事件

translation.en: And so this is the leftovers, basically. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎基本上 这就是剩余部分

translation.en: If you asked what inspired me, this is what inspired me.
translation.zh:
‎如果你问是什么激励了我
‎这就是激励我的

translation.en: -[Bala] Saturn V? -[Hans] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-土星五号？
‎-对

translation.en: I mean, that's what I saw when I was a kid.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 这就是我小时候看到的

translation.en: This is pretty crazy.
translation.zh: ‎这太疯狂了

translation.en: You know how much thrust it had? A million and something?
translation.zh:
‎你知道它有多大推力吗？
‎一百万或者更大？

translation.en: [Bala] Like the size of that gas generator,
translation.zh: ‎就像那个气体发生器那么大

translation.en: it almost looks like the size of our thrust chamber.
translation.zh: ‎几乎和我们的推力室差不多大

translation.en: -[Hans] Exactly. -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: [Hans] Yeah, it's huge.
translation.zh: ‎对 这个真的很大

translation.en: This is the most powerful rocket that had been built up to date.
translation.zh: ‎这是迄今为止建造的最强大的火箭

translation.en: [Bala] Yeah, you just need that energy to get--
translation.zh: ‎是的 你就是需要那种能量来获得…

translation.en: To the Moon.
translation.zh: ‎来去月球

translation.en: -Or to Mars. -Mars, so… [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-或者去火星
‎-火星 所以…

translation.en: The other thing to recognize is, like, this was all like new stuff
translation.zh: ‎另一件需要注意的事情是 这些都是

translation.en: that they had made and, like, didn't have much flight experience on.
translation.zh:
‎他们做的新设备
‎没有太多的飞行经验

translation.en: I mean, we have, like, 80-something flights.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我们有过80多次飞行

translation.en: And we're slowly getting into those flights.
translation.zh: ‎我们慢慢地精进这些飞行

translation.en: Only now are we confident enough to put Bob and Doug in there. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎直到现在我们才有足够的信心
‎让鲍勃和道格进入

translation.en: And they tested it twice and said, "Okay, you guys go in there." [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎他们测试了两次 然后说
‎“好吧 你们可以进去了”

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: All right, let's go one step further.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我们再进一步

translation.en: -That's the lunar lander. -[Bala] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-那是月球着陆器
‎-对

translation.en: It looks small, actually.
translation.zh: ‎其实看起来很小

translation.en: -I wanna see that inside. -[Bala] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我想看看里面
‎-好

translation.en: They'd be standing up in there, basically.
translation.zh: ‎他们基本上会站在那里

translation.en: There's no… no chair or anything.
translation.zh: ‎里面没有椅子什么的

translation.en: [Bala] Yeah, and this had the rudiments of digital computers in there.
translation.zh: ‎对 这里面有数码电脑的雏形

translation.en: [Hans] I mean, a computer on this thing,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 这上面有台电脑

translation.en: I don't think there's anything comparable that we have.
translation.zh:
‎我不认为我们有任何
‎可以与之相比的东西

translation.en: -A car key is probably smarter. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-车钥匙可能更聪明
‎-是的

translation.en: But, I mean, they made it work.
translation.zh: ‎但我是说 他们制作成功了

translation.en: -I mean, that's the main thing. -That's the fascinating thing.
translation.zh:
‎-我是说 那是最主要的
‎-这就是有趣的事

translation.en: Even more dramatic when you think that what they had
translation.zh:
‎当你想到他们用电子设备
‎来实现这一目标时

translation.en: in terms of electronics to make that work.
translation.zh: ‎就更加激动人心了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Hans] Pretty inspiring coming back here and just looking at it.
translation.zh:
‎回到这里 仅仅看着这个
‎就觉得很鼓舞人心

translation.en: Now that we've shown that we can fly astronauts…
translation.zh:
‎既然我们已经证明了
‎我们可以让宇航员飞行…

translation.en: …it's time to go back to the Moon with astronauts again for a longer time
translation.zh:
‎是时候带着宇航员
‎再次回到月球上待更长时间

translation.en: and extend our range to Mars.
translation.zh: ‎并将我们的范围扩大到火星了

translation.en: [Elon] These super smart, super talented people, they believe in the goal.
translation.zh:
‎这些超级聪明、超级有才华的人
‎他们相信目标

translation.en: A base on the Moon and a city on Mars can happen.
translation.zh:
‎在月球上建立基地
‎和在火星上建立城市都是可能的

translation.en: I was not sure whether such a path existed before.
translation.zh: ‎我以前不确定是否存在这样的道路

translation.en: Now I am confident that such a path exists.
translation.zh: ‎现在我确信这条道路是存在的

translation.en: But first, we got a real important mission tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎但首先 我们明天有个很重要的任务

translation.en: [officer] Good morning, Bob and Doug.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 鲍勃和道格

translation.en: We have a special message for you to start your day.
translation.zh:
‎我们有一条特别的信息
‎让你们开始新的一天

translation.en: [Theo] Rise and shine, Daddy. We love you.
translation.zh: ‎起床了 爸爸 我们爱你

translation.en: We can't wait to see you. Wake up, wake up!
translation.zh: ‎我们迫不及待地想见到你了 醒醒！

translation.en: [Jack] I'm happy you went into space,
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴你去了太空

translation.en: but I'm even happier that you're coming back home.
translation.zh: ‎但我更高兴的是你就要回家了

translation.en: [Theo] Hurry home so we can go get my dog.
translation.zh:
‎快点回家
‎这样我们就能去找我的狗了

translation.en: [Jack] We love you, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎我们爱你 爸爸

translation.en: [Bob] We're about to embark on the final portion of the journey.
translation.zh: ‎我们即将踏上旅程的最后一段

translation.en: And as I look forward to heading back home,
translation.zh: ‎当我期待着回家的时候

translation.en: my son and Doug's son are really excited not only to get their fathers back
translation.zh:
‎我儿子和道格的儿子真的非常兴奋
‎不仅是因为他们的父亲要回来了

translation.en: but to get our Apatosaurus, our zero-G indicator,
translation.zh:
‎还因为我们的雷龙
‎和我们的零重力指示器

translation.en: that they nominated to go with us.
translation.zh: ‎这都是他们要求我们带来的

translation.en: And so for Jack and Theo,
translation.zh: ‎所以对于杰克和西奥

translation.en: uh, Tremor the Apatosaurus is, uh, headed home soon.
translation.zh: ‎震颤雷龙很快就要回家了

translation.en: [Megan] Reentry is obviously the next big milestone,
translation.zh: ‎重返大气层显然是下一个重大里程碑

translation.en: and so everything has to work really, really well.
translation.zh: ‎所以一切都必须非常顺利地进行

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: [Doug] SpaceX, Dragon. Comm checks. Dragon to ground.
translation.zh:
‎龙飞船呼叫太空探索技术公司
‎通讯检查 从龙飞船到地面

translation.en: [Megan] It's hard to prepare yourself.
translation.zh: ‎很难让自己做好准备

translation.en: You don't know exactly what you're gonna feel.
translation.zh: ‎你不知道具体自己会有什么感觉

translation.en: But there's a part of you that can't let go
translation.zh: ‎但你内心深处有一种无法释怀的

translation.en: of that sort of, you know, hopefully irrational fear
translation.zh: ‎希望是非理性的恐惧

translation.en: that something could go wrong.
translation.zh: ‎害怕事情会出问题

translation.en: [Anna] The final reconfigurations for undock are complete and nominal.
translation.zh: ‎最后的重新配置是完整和正常的

translation.en: [Megan] Am I gonna be nervous? Absolutely.
translation.zh: ‎我会紧张吗？绝对会

translation.en: But I want my son to experience the joy and excitement of that moment
translation.zh:
‎但我想让我的儿子
‎体验到那一刻的喜悦和兴奋

translation.en: and try to keep all of the… the nervousness to myself.
translation.zh: ‎并尽量把紧张的情绪憋在自己心里

translation.en: [Anna] The ground is go for undocking.
translation.zh: ‎地面准备分离

translation.en: Please confirm your visors are down
translation.zh: ‎请确认您的面罩已戴好

translation.en: and that you are ready for undock and departure.
translation.zh: ‎你已经准备好分离并离开了

translation.en: [Doug] Our visors are down, and we're ready for departure.
translation.zh: ‎我们已戴好面罩 并已准备好离开

translation.en: [Anna] Dragon, SpaceX. Separation confirmed.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎已确认分离

translation.en: [Chris] Endeavour, Station. Bob and Doug,
translation.zh: ‎空间站呼叫奋进号 鲍勃和道格

translation.en: it's been an honor to serve with you.
translation.zh: ‎很荣幸能与你们共事

translation.en: Safe travels and have a successful landing.
translation.zh: ‎祝你们旅途平安、着陆顺利

translation.en: Godspeed.
translation.zh: ‎祝一切成功

translation.en: Endeavour copies all. Thanks, Chris.
translation.zh: ‎奋进号收到 多谢 克里斯

translation.en: Bob and I, we're just excited to get back home.
translation.zh: ‎鲍勃和我 我们很兴奋可以返回家园

translation.en: But you can never let your guard down, especially on a first flight.
translation.zh:
‎但你永远不能放松警惕
‎尤其是在第一次飞行的时候

translation.en: You know, you really have to do the whole mission end to end.
translation.zh: ‎你必须从头到尾完成整个任务

translation.en: There was a time when we thought,
translation.zh: ‎曾几何时 我们想

translation.en: "Well, we just get through the ascent, and we'll be fine."
translation.zh: ‎“好吧 我们只要完成升空就没事了”

translation.en: But then we had Columbia.
translation.zh: ‎但之后我们发生了哥伦比亚事件

translation.en: [flight director] Everything look good to you?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得一切都好吗？

translation.en: Control and rates and everything is nominal, right?
translation.zh: ‎控制和速度等等 一切都正常 对吧？

translation.en: [officer] Control has been stable. We have good trims.
translation.zh: ‎控制系统稳定 我们的平衡也很好

translation.en: -I don't see anything out of the ordinary. -[flight director] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我没看到任何异常
‎-好

translation.en: [astronaut 1] This is amazing. It's really getting fairly bright out there.
translation.zh: ‎太惊人了 外面的光线越来越亮了

translation.en: [astronaut 2] Yeah, you definitely don't want to be outside now.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你现在绝对不想出去

translation.en: [Doug] Both Bob and I were on the runway where the shuttle would be landing.
translation.zh:
‎鲍勃和我当时都在航天飞机
‎将要降落的跑道上

translation.en: I remember them knocking on the window
translation.zh: ‎我记得他们敲窗户

translation.en: and saying to us that they'd lost, uh, comm,
translation.zh: ‎告诉我们 他们失去了

translation.en: uh, and data and tracking from Columbia.
translation.zh: ‎来自哥伦比亚号的通讯、数据和追踪

translation.en: [officer 1] Columbia, Houston, comm check.
translation.zh: ‎休斯顿呼叫哥伦比亚号 通讯检查

translation.en: Columbia, Houston, UHF comm check.
translation.zh:
‎休斯顿呼叫哥伦比亚号
‎超高频通讯检查

translation.en: [officer 2] We do not have any valid data at this time.
translation.zh: ‎我们目前没有任何有效数据

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -[woman] Oh my God.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: [news anchor] We've got some breaking news.
translation.zh: ‎我们收到一些突发新闻

translation.en: There you see what appears to be multiple pieces of the shuttle.
translation.zh:
‎你们看到的
‎似乎是航天飞机的多个碎片

translation.en: We can only hope that what we're seeing is not the worst.
translation.zh:
‎我们只能希望
‎我们看到的不是最糟糕的

translation.en: [Doug] When landing time came and the shuttle didn't come,
translation.zh:
‎当着陆时间到了
‎而航天飞机没有返回

translation.en: we were there in the room
translation.zh: ‎我们当时就在房间里

translation.en: when they told the families what they think had happened
translation.zh:
‎他们告诉宇航员家属
‎他们认为可能发生了什么

translation.en: and that it was likely not survivable
translation.zh: ‎事情结果可能凶多吉少

translation.en: and that they were, you know, gonna do the best they could,
translation.zh: ‎他们会尽自己全力做到最好

translation.en: but when the vehicle broke up at 200, 250,000 feet,
translation.zh:
‎但当航天器在
‎32万到40万公里的高空解体

translation.en: that it's not likely that anybody survived.
translation.zh: ‎不太可能有人幸存

translation.en: Just seeing the pieces of Columbia,
translation.zh: ‎看着哥伦比亚号的残骸

translation.en: pieces of the crew module and helmets and those kinds of things,
translation.zh: ‎机组人员舱的碎片、头盔之类的东西

translation.en: you know, that… that leaves an impression that I think you never ever…
translation.zh:
‎这会给人留下一个印象
‎我认为你永远不会…

translation.en: you never really get over.
translation.zh: ‎你永远都忘不了

translation.en: When you lose a rocket with a payload on it,
translation.zh: ‎当你失去一枚带有有效载荷的火箭

translation.en: that is a bad situation.
translation.zh: ‎那会是一种糟糕的情况

translation.en: But if you lose a rocket with a crew on it,
translation.zh:
‎但如果你失去了一个
‎载有宇航员的火箭

translation.en: that… that is an order of magnitude different.
translation.zh: ‎那糟糕程度的数量级就大不相同了

translation.en: And in the end, you don't want anybody to ever have to go through that again.
translation.zh:
‎到最后 你不会想让任何人
‎再经历一次

translation.en: [Kiko] We have been preparing for Bob and Doug to come home.
translation.zh: ‎我们一直在为鲍勃和道格回家做准备

translation.en: You know, as soon as that capsule released,
translation.zh: ‎一旦太空舱离开

translation.en: uh, and we undocked,
translation.zh: ‎我们分离了

translation.en: the nerves popped up again,
translation.zh: ‎紧张就又出现了

translation.en: the general feeling of like, "Oh man, we're in free flight."
translation.zh:
‎一般的感觉就是
‎“天啊 我们在自由飞行了”

translation.en: And these boys are coming home. It's happening.
translation.zh: ‎这些人要回家了 这些事确实发生了

translation.en: Um, there's no turning back at this point.
translation.zh: ‎现在已经没有回头路了

translation.en: So… it's time to rock and roll,
translation.zh: ‎所以… ‎是时候摇滚起来了

translation.en: talk to the recovery dudes, and… and get Bob and Doug home.
translation.zh:
‎跟返航部门的人说说
‎让鲍勃和道格回家

translation.en: [male host] Everything's been going very smoothly for Bob and Doug
translation.zh: ‎自从鲍勃和道格昨天脱离太空站以来

translation.en: ever since they undocked from the space station yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎他们的一切都很顺利

translation.en: Now just ready and waiting to begin the reentry process.
translation.zh:
‎现在已经准备好
‎准备开始重返大气层的过程

translation.en: [Jessie] Yeah, really exciting day as we approach splashdown here
translation.zh:
‎是的 真是令人兴奋的一天
‎因为我们在几个小时后

translation.en: in a matter of a few hours…
translation.zh: ‎就要降落在这里了…

translation.en: [Hans] I've gotta talk to these two guys.
translation.zh: ‎我要跟这两个人谈谈

translation.en: [Jessie] …to think that this all started two months ago, and here we are.
translation.zh:
‎…想想这一切两个月前就开始了
‎现在我们走到了这里

translation.en: -[Hans] Did you get some sleep? -[man] Yeah. A few hours.
translation.zh:
‎-你睡着了吗？
‎-睡着了 睡了几个小时

translation.en: -[Hans] A few hours? -[man laughs] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-几个小时？
‎-是的

translation.en: -[Hans] How's everything looking? -[man] Ready to go.
translation.zh:
‎-一切看起来都好吗？
‎-准备就绪了

translation.en: Yeah, everything's looking great. Dragon's in good shape.
translation.zh:
‎对 一切看起来都很棒
‎龙飞船的状态很好

translation.en: [Hans] All right, good luck.
translation.zh: ‎好 希望好运

translation.en: -Good luck. -[man] All right, good luck.
translation.zh:
‎-希望好运
‎-好 希望好运

translation.en: [Hans] Oh, look at that.
translation.zh: ‎看看那个

translation.en: They seem super calm.
translation.zh: ‎他们看起来超级冷静

translation.en: I guess it doesn't go over well when they're nervous. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我想他们紧张的时候
‎情况就不太好了

translation.en: Actually, you can see they're nervous. They do this… [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎事实上 你可以看到他们很紧张
‎他们这样做…

translation.en: You know, every once in a while. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎每隔一段时间都会这样

translation.en: I think reentry is the part that everybody hates.
translation.zh:
‎我认为重返大气层
‎是所有人都不喜欢的部分

translation.en: You're in a stable orbit around the Earth,
translation.zh: ‎你在地球的稳定轨道上

translation.en: and then you do a reentry burn.
translation.zh: ‎然后再进行重返大气层燃烧

translation.en: That's a thrust maneuver that reduces your velocity
translation.zh: ‎这是一种降低速度的推力动作

translation.en: so that you start descending
translation.zh: ‎这样你就会开始下降

translation.en: until you hit dense atmosphere
translation.zh: ‎直到你撞到稠密的大气层

translation.en: and you can't get a radio signal out anymore.
translation.zh: ‎然后你就再也收不到无线电信号了

translation.en: It's called "blackout."
translation.zh: ‎这被称为“暂时失联”

translation.en: For a few minutes, you're in the dark on the ground,
translation.zh: ‎有几分钟时间 你会处于黑暗的状态

translation.en: and you have no idea what happens.
translation.zh: ‎你根本不知道会发生什么

translation.en: Okay, blackout here is 18:36,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 暂时失联状态将在18:36发生

translation.en: and you land at 48.
translation.zh: ‎你们将在18:48着陆

translation.en: So that's 12 minutes before we land, is the blackout.
translation.zh:
‎所以在我们着陆前12分钟
‎就全程处于暂时失联状态

translation.en: [Bala] What altitude is that?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么高度？

translation.en: -A hundred and five? -[Hans] So…
[Bala] A hundred and ninety-five kilometers?
-Does that sound too high? -Uh, it does sound a little bit high.
translation.zh: ‎但…听起来是不是太高了？ ‎听起来确实有点高

translation.en: -Found it? -[Bala] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-找到了吗？
‎-找到了

translation.en: Forty-seven.
translation.zh: ‎47公里

translation.en: -[Hans] Okay, fifty. -[Bala] Fifty. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好 50公里
‎-50公里 好

translation.en: [Hans] So it happens between 50 and 30 kilometers.
translation.zh: ‎情况将在50到30公里之间发生

translation.en: That means you fall from 30 kilometers to six kilometers in two minutes?
translation.zh:
‎这意味着你在两分钟内
‎将从30公里下降到6公里？

translation.en: -[Bala] That's crazy. -[Hans] That seems crazy fast, man.
translation.zh:
‎-这太疯狂了
‎-是的 听起来太快了 兄弟

translation.en: -[Bala] Yeah. -[Hans] Remarkable.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-太了不起了

translation.en: You're moving at high speed, and you're using the atmosphere to brake.
translation.zh: ‎你在高速移动 你在利用大气来打破

translation.en: It's a lot of energy.
translation.zh: ‎这是很大的能量

translation.en: It gets hot on the outside,
translation.zh: ‎外部会变得非常热

translation.en: and on the inside, you see the fire flying by the window.
translation.zh:
‎在里面 你可以看到
‎火焰从窗户边飞过

translation.en: You need a heat shield that is perfect.
translation.zh: ‎你需要一个完美的隔热罩

translation.en: And after you get through the atmosphere, you still have to deploy the parachutes.
translation.zh:
‎当你穿过大气层后
‎你仍然需要打开降落伞

translation.en: They come out, then two minutes later, you deploy the chutes. It's pretty quick.
translation.zh:
‎他们出来了 两分钟后
‎你将打开降落伞 这速度很快的

translation.en: [Bala] In my mind, it's probably the parachutes
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 降落伞可能是

translation.en: that are the most significant thing that needs to work.
translation.zh: ‎整个工作中最重要的东西

translation.en: In spite of all the testing we've done, that's still one of the riskiest parts.
translation.zh:
‎尽管进行了所有的测试
‎它仍然是最危险的部分之一

translation.en: [Hans] Right.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Bala] And, you know, we haven't had a splashdown since the Apollo program.
translation.zh:
‎自从阿波罗计划后
‎我们就没有降落过

translation.en: [Hans] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX for entry brief.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎简要介绍情况

translation.en: [Bob] Go ahead.
translation.zh: ‎请讲

translation.en: The recovery team is go, and the weather is great,
translation.zh: ‎救援队已经出发了 天气也很好

translation.en: and your vehicle is still looking really good for entry.
translation.zh:
‎你们的飞行器目前看起来非常好
‎很适合返航

translation.en: No health issues at this time.
translation.zh: ‎目前没有任何缺陷

translation.en: -[Bob] Copy. -[beeping]
translation.zh: ‎收到

translation.en: [Elon] How long until they hit the atmosphere?
translation.zh: ‎他们多久才能进入大气层？ ‎他们五分钟后进入序列

translation.en: [Hans] They go into the sequence in five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎他们五分钟后进入序列

translation.en: I'm actually here for the deorbit burn.
translation.zh: ‎我其实是来看脱轨燃烧的

translation.en: To make sure that goes well.
translation.zh: ‎为了确保一切顺利

translation.en: -Deorbit burn's coming up now? -[Hans] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-马上要脱轨燃烧了吗？
‎-对

translation.en: [Hans] Well…
translation.zh: ‎好吧…

translation.en: Everything's looking good, I think.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得一切看起来都很好

translation.en: Yeah, well, it certainly has been quite a journey.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 这真是一段漫长的旅程

translation.en: [Hans] Crazy. Here we are, right?
translation.zh: ‎太疯狂了 我们走到了这里 对吧？

translation.en: [Elon] Yes, 18 years.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 18年了

translation.en: -[Hans] Are you nervous? -[Elon] Yeah, I am.
translation.zh:
‎-你紧张吗？
‎-是的 紧张

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. Deorbit burn start.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎开始脱轨燃烧

translation.en: [Bob] We copy. Go.
translation.zh: ‎收到 开始

translation.en: [man] Cool as a cucumber, because they're not breathing very heavy,
translation.zh:
‎像黄瓜一样冷静
‎他们的呼吸没有很沉重

translation.en: 'cause their CO2's not going up.
translation.zh: ‎因为他们的二氧化碳数值没有上升

translation.en: -[Hans] That's good. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-那样很好
‎-是的

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. Deorbit burn complete.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎脱轨燃烧完成

translation.en: Performance nominal.
translation.zh: ‎表现正常

translation.en: Nose cone closure initiated.
translation.zh: ‎启动前锥体闭合

translation.en: All right, boys.
translation.zh: ‎很好 各位

translation.en: [officer] Brace for entry.
translation.zh: ‎已准备好返航

translation.en: [Bob] Copy.
translation.zh: ‎收到

translation.en: [Kiko] All right.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: ‎我们开始吧

translation.en: [Hans] Four G's. That's moving.
translation.zh: ‎重力加速度是4 太感人了

translation.en: Almost like a little comet.
translation.zh: ‎就像一颗小彗星

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. We show two minutes until predicted comm blackout.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎显示距离预测暂时失联还有两分钟

translation.en: We will see you on the other side at 18:42.
translation.zh: ‎我们18:42在另一边见

translation.en: [Bob] Dragon copy, 18:42.
translation.zh: ‎龙飞船 收到 18:42见

translation.en: [Kiko] Okay, we're in blackout.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们现在处于暂时失联状态

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: [Kiko] Jesus, dude. This thing is so long.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 兄弟 这时间也太长了

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: [Kiko] Come on, where is it?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 在哪儿呢？

translation.en: Let's find that puppy.
translation.zh: ‎让我们来找找那个小东西吧

translation.en: Oh, there it is.
translation.zh: ‎在那里

translation.en: [officer] Dragon, SpaceX. Comm check.
translation.zh:
‎太空探索技术公司呼叫龙飞船
‎通讯检查

translation.en: [Bob] Copy, I heard you loud and clear. We're about 3.9 G's.
translation.zh:
‎收到 我能清楚地听到
‎重力加速度大概是3.9

translation.en: [officer] Copy, we've got you.
translation.zh: ‎收到 我们找到你了

translation.en: -[Kiko] All right. -[man 1] Hell yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-太好了

translation.en: [man 2] Coming in hot.
translation.zh: ‎马上就来了

translation.en: [officer] Passing 15 kilometers, brace for drogue window.
translation.zh: ‎超过15公里 准备进入阻力窗

translation.en: [Bob] Copy, we're braced.
translation.zh: ‎收到 我们已做好准备

translation.en: [Kiko] Come on, baby.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 宝贝

translation.en: [officer] Visual, two drogues out.
translation.zh: ‎已观测到两个降落伞出现

translation.en: [Bob] Oh yeah, we felt it.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我们看到了

translation.en: [Kiko] Slow down, baby.
translation.zh: ‎慢点儿 宝贝

translation.en: [officer] Drogue descent rate nominal.
translation.zh: ‎阻力下降速度正常

translation.en: -[Kiko] Nice. -[clapping]
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Let's get these mains out.
translation.zh: ‎让我们打开主降落伞吧

translation.en: [Kiko] Inflate, baby.
translation.zh: ‎充气吧 宝贝

translation.en: Inflate.
translation.zh: ‎充气

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: ‎来吧

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on, come on.
translation.zh: ‎来吧

translation.en: [officer] We are visual on four chutes out.
translation.zh: ‎我们已观测到四个降落伞

translation.en: -[man 1] Ooh. -[man 2] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: [Kiko] Hold on. Almost down to the ground.
translation.zh: ‎等等 马上就要到地面了

translation.en: [officer] Main chute decent rate nominal.
translation.zh: ‎主降落伞下降速度正常

translation.en: Passing through 700 meters.
translation.zh: ‎降至700米

translation.en: [Hans] And we're back to seven meters per second. Nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我们又回到了七米每秒 ‎什么感觉都没有

translation.en: It's, like, sitting there.
translation.zh: ‎就感觉坐在这里

translation.en: Boom.
translation.zh: ‎嘣

translation.en: Slowing.
translation.zh: ‎慢慢下来

translation.en: [officer] Six hundred meters.
Six hundred meters.
Two hundred meters.
We are braced for splashdown.
translation.zh: ‎我们已准备好在海上降落

translation.en: [man] Copy. Brace for splashdown.
translation.zh: ‎收到 准备好在海上降落

translation.en: -All right! Whoo! -[all applauding]
translation.zh: ‎好极了！

translation.en: [officer] Welcome back to planet Earth, and thanks for flying SpaceX.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎回到地球
‎谢谢为太空探索技术公司飞行

translation.en: [Kiko] Hell yeah!
translation.zh: ‎太棒了

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: ‎太好了！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: Everything's good?
translation.zh: ‎一切都好吗？

translation.en: [Hans] Everything was great. This was super smooth.
translation.zh: ‎一切都很好 非常顺利

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: [Kiko] Are there small boats out there?
translation.zh: ‎那边有小船吗？

translation.en: That doesn't look like a 45-footer to me. That looks like a…
translation.zh: ‎那在我看来不是13米 那看起来是…

translation.en: Now there's a… Who the hell is this?
translation.zh: ‎现在那里…那是谁？

translation.en: -[Hans] It's a boat there. Not ours. -[Elon] Oh, it's someone else?
translation.zh:
‎-那里有艘船 不是我们的
‎-是别人的？

translation.en: [Hans] Not ours. Yeah, these are not our boats.
